original_text: And they took their journey from Elim, and all the congregation of the children of Israel came unto the wilderness of Sin, which is between Elim and Sinai, on the fifteenth day of the second month after their departing out of the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 온 회중이 엘림에서 떠나 엘림과 시내 산 사이에 있는 신 광야에 이르니 애굽에서 나온 후 둘째 달 십오일이라

sentences.original_text: And they took their journey from Elim
and all the congregation of the children of Israel
came unto the wilderness of Sin
which is between Elim and Sinai
on the fifteenth day of the second month
after their departing out of the land of Egypt
